description: Fundamental axioms for finality semantics v1

axioms.name: Deterministic Verdicts
axioms.statement: Given identical inputs (bundle content, profile, contracts, schemas), any verifier must produce byte-identical verdict output
axioms.proof_requirement: Any two verifiers with same inputs must output identical verdict.json

axioms.name: Unappealable Surface
axioms.statement: Only bundle content can change outcomes. Not arguments, interpretations, or external state
axioms.proof_requirement: Verdict cannot change without bundle hash changing

axioms.name: Contradiction Detection
axioms.statement: Two claims with same subject but incompatible assertions, both with valid signatures, must result in CONTRADICTED verdict
axioms.proof_requirement: Contradiction detection must be deterministic and cite which evidence invalidates which claim

axioms.name: Retroactive Invalidation
axioms.statement: Invalidations are cryptographically bound and discoverable. Any matching invalidation downgrades verdict with explicit reason codes
axioms.proof_requirement: Invalidation matching must be deterministic and verifiable

axioms.name: Profile Legal Modes
axioms.statement: Different profiles define required evidence classes, trust assumptions, and failure severity mappings
axioms.proof_requirement: Profile requirements must be explicitly defined and enforced
